channel.title: Help?
channel.description:
[size=14pt]I was just wondering if i could get some help on a small project im working on. Basically i downloaded a blank source and client . Im working on the client and source. i am a noob coder so i don't know much about the coding and all. So i had a few questions maybe someone could help ?
1st question - i was wondering how do i change my home location when i log in im in lumbridge and my home teleport is lumbridge how can i set it to spawn in edgeville.
2nd question - i tried to install i shop first i set a ncp id - 520 (shop keeper) at x and y cord 3222 3218 (Lumbridge center) when i attempted to add items to the shop i couldn't access my server. i then deleted all the code i added to the server.
3rd question - If anyone has a textbox and titlebox for the pillar's and the burning torches background could you possibly post here or give me a link to get ?
Please and thank you. Im not sure if i need to present this in a format or not. but like i said im a noob coder. Im interested in learning how to do so, maybe in the future you'll see some of my work. I have some good idea's for the server but i need to get the basic's down. my plan is to edit the blank source and client to a basic server. first shop's . anti leech. anti lagg. anti dupe. ban names that start with admin etc. etc. So i need some help doing so. if anyone could help me i would gladly appreciate it.[/size]

item.title: Help?
item.dc:creator: @Uwpkz Uwpkz
item.description:
@Uwpkz wrote:

[size=14pt]I was just wondering if i could get some help on a small project im working on.
Basically i downloaded a blank source and client . Im working on the client and source. i am a noob coder so i don’t know much about the coding and all. So i had a few questions maybe someone could help ?

1st question - i was wondering how do i change my home location when i log in im in lumbridge and my home teleport is lumbridge how can i set it to spawn in edgeville.

2nd question - i tried to install i shop first i set a ncp id - 520 (shop keeper) at x and y cord 3222 3218 (Lumbridge center) when i attempted to add items to the shop i couldn’t access my server. i then deleted all the code i added to the server.

3rd question - If anyone has a textbox and titlebox for the pillar’s and the burning torches background could you possibly post here or give me a link to get ?

Please and thank you. Im not sure if i need to present this in a format or not. but like i said im a noob coder. Im interested in learning how to do so, maybe in the future you’ll see some of my work. I have some good idea’s for the server but i need to get the basic’s down. my plan is to edit the blank source and client to a basic server. first shop’s . anti leech. anti lagg. anti dupe. ban names that start with admin etc. etc. So i need some help doing so. if anyone could help me i would gladly appreciate it.[/size]
